alert.note: Alert for Adams; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:44PM MDT until June 21 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... North central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 844 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Prospect Valley, or 32 miles northeast of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Prospect Valley around 850 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
